DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine gastric tolerability pharmacokinetics new drug treatment type 2 diabetes , DMMET-01 , healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Mexican healthy subject normal clinical laboratory test result image ( hematology , blood chemistry , urine test , VDRL , Hepatitis B , HIV , chest radiography electrocardiogram ) Familiar personal history diabetes History drug alcohol abuse within 2 year prior study A smoking habit great tha 10 cigarette per day Intercurrent disease Intercurrent treatment drug
